resp = client.render_search_template(
    source={
        "query": {
            "term": {
                "url.full": "{{#url}}{{host}}/{{page}}{{/url}}"
            }
        }
    },
    params={
        "host": "http://example.com",
        "page": "hello-world"
    },
)
print(resp)
